content: * this is the ad-free easy-to-print version of this pattern you can find the free pattern on my blog www cozynooksdesigns com and my youtube channel * this listing is for a crochet pattern only so that you can make your own taylor s version pillow love taylor swift or looking for a taylor swift gift you can diy this crochet taylor swift pillow uses tapestry crochet techniques and the crochet pattern comes with an easy to follow chart to avoid the frustration there are also written instructions if you prefer to follow tapestry crochet by word pattern includes - videos aids as well as pictures graph as well as written instructions instant download pdf file us crochet terminology level - experienced beginner materials - 3 colors of worsted weight yarn 560 yards 85 yards & 45 yards 5 0 mm/h crochet hook 18 pillow insert finished sized - 17 5 x 17 5 *** if you buy 2 patterns - use code 2patterns for 10% off if you buy 3 patterns - use code 3patterns for 15% off if you buy 4 patterns - use code 4patterns for 20% off *** sales and distribution - when posting to social media or another platform please refer back to me as the designer if you re on instagram tag me @cozynooksdesigns and use the hashtag #taylorsversionpillow for a chance to be featured rewriting reselling distributing or copying the pattern itself is prohibited you have permission to sell the finished product for this pattern however please give credit to me for the pattern includes written instructions an easy-to-follow chart and pictures requires knowledge of basic crochet stitches patterns due to the electronic nature of my patterns i cannot offer refunds
